name: Crystal Colors
description:
Crystal Colors is a game about two girls trying to live normally in a world that is slowly fading away into pure nothingness. 

Will you be brave enough to saved your loved one, or will you be erased too?

CREATED FOR WINTER VN JAM 2020

--Credits--

Art and Writing by 4noki on itch.io and on Twitter

Logo and UI Design, Scripting, Editing and Co-Writing by   m.   on Twitter

Backgrounds by JensterCreations

Snow coding by Omelette on itch.io
